main.name: Yash Garg
main.description: doing my Dual-degree course in Civil Engineering from IIT (BHU), Varanasi and I am interested in Software Development and Technology
main.bio: Hello everyone, I am Yash Garg. I am a hardworking and dedicated person who like to take challenges. I am interested in technology, Software Development, Web Development. I love reading a lot and am a huge Potter Fan

education.school: Indian Institute of Technology, Banaras Hindu University (IIT BHU), Varanasi

work.title: Frontend Development Intern
work.description: Worked on live projects of Company. Worked on the Frontend of CXDeployer and IdeaDeployer Website. Made few mobile responsive website page on both website on ReactJS. Also cloned the website frontend of various website.

work.title: Intern
work.description: Made an API to update the list of URLs on Database(MongoDB) for different profile. Made an API to Delete the uploaded image from AWS S3. Made an API to Upload an Image on AWS S3.

projects.title: Canadian Wanderlust
projects.category: My Travel Blog for my post-university travels

projects.title: Fury Fighting Gear
projects.category: (offline now) A fighting gear company I started

projects.title: Original Thai Food
projects.category: Website I built for a restaurant I like in Thailand

projects.title: Resume Website

projects.title: Smirkspace
projects.category: (MVP Only) A React and Meteor based chat University project.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
